A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Happy with the direction Rian Johnson took the mythology of the saga. Something needed to change for Star Wars to remain relevant for years to come. The same story couldn't be told over and over. I understand why some would feel like this movie was a slap in the face to longtime/hardcore fans\, but a new take on the universe is needed. The Last Jedi is the start of a new direction and I'm grateful for it.
